verbose_text: The selective I CaT inhibitors TTA-P2 and Z944 (1 muM, n = 2 for each drug) abolished the inward current as well as the generation of rebound APs in both control solution and following Epi exposure (XREF_FIG).
evidence: CaT  inhibitors TTA-P2               and Z944               (1 muM, n = 2 for each drug) abolished the inward current as well as the generation of rebound APs
